info.message:
Welcome to 'Want to Plant Some Grass?'!
I'm Jenkinsu, here to guide you through the service. Shall we take a look around?

move.message:
This is your own space!
Use the arrow keys (↑,↓,←,→) or WASD to move your character freely!

chat.message:
Want to chat with your teammates?
Press Enter to open the chat, type a message, and press Enter again to send!

progress.message:
This gauge represents our collective 'passion'! It fills up as you focus on coding and contribute on GitHub.
What happens when we fill it up together?!

channel.message:
Want to check or change your current channel?
Press the channel button to move to another channel and meet new friends!

leaderboard.message:
What's your contribution ranking? See who's been the most focused!
A new season starts every week — why not aim to be this week's top contributor?

character.message:
Curious about your profile?
Click the user info button or your character in the game to open the modal!
character.afterModalMessage:
In the profile tab, you can check your focus history!
You can also see the point earning policy here.

subSteps.petTab: Now click the pet tab to meet your cute pet friends!
subSteps.petGacha: Welcome! Press the pet gacha button to meet your first pet friend!

pet.message:
Congratulations! You've met your first pet!
Feed your pet to help it grow and evolve. You can also change your main pet in the codex!

task.message:
Lastly, you can start a timer and play music from the task panel in the top right!
Ready to start focus mode? Let's go!

hints.keypress: Try pressing the arrow keys or WASD!
hints.chatOpen: Press Enter to open the chat!
hints.chatClose: Type a message and press Enter to close the chat!
